meanings.definition: Treatment intended to relieve or heal a disorder.
meanings.sent1: The therapy helped her recover from the injury.
meanings.sent2: She attends therapy sessions to work on her anxiety.
meanings.sent3: The therapy for her fear of spiders involved holding a toy spider.
meanings.sent4: Laughter can be a therapy for the soul.
meanings.sent5: The therapy provided a soothing balm for her troubled mind.

meanings.definition: The treatment of mental or psychological disorders.
meanings.sent1: His therapy focuses on managing his depression.
meanings.sent2: Cognitive behavioral therapy is commonly used for anxiety disorders.
meanings.sent3: The therapy for his fear of heights involved climbing a ladder.
meanings.sent4: Music can be a therapy for the mind during stressful times.
meanings.sent5: The therapy sessions helped her find peace within herself.

meanings.definition: The act of healing or curing.
meanings.sent1: The therapy of the wound involved cleaning and bandaging.
meanings.sent2: Herbal therapy has been used for centuries to promote wellness.
meanings.sent3: The therapy for the broken vase was to glue the pieces back together.
meanings.sent4: Time can be a therapy for emotional wounds.
meanings.sent5: The therapy of forgiveness can bring inner peace.
